FieldGroup.Title: Image a Source was Extracted From

Pattern.Name: refSourceId
Pattern.Title: WISE Source ID
Pattern.ShortDescription: The Level 1b or catalog source ID to search for. Level 1b example: 01500a063-000011, catalog example: 2344p242_ab41-007286.
Pattern.ErrorDescription: WISE Source ID cannot be blank and should match Source ID pattern!
